    </div>
  </a></div><div class="con "><div class="user"><a data-usercard-mid="484000877" href="//space.bilibili.com/484000877" target="_black" class="name" style="color:">我妈是女娲</a><a class="level-link" href="//www.bilibili.com/blackboard/help.html#%E4%BC%9A%E5%91%98%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3" target="_blank"><i class="level l4"></i></a></div><p class="text">真相一来，有些人瞬间觉得索然无味了</p><div class="info"><span class="time">2021-05-13 11:53</span><span class="like "><i></i><span>2</span></span><span class="hate "><i></i></span><span class="reply btn-hover">回复</span><div class="operation more-operation"><div class="spot"></div><div class="opera-list"><ul><li class="blacklist">加入黑名单</li><li class="report">举报</li></ul></div></div></div><div class="reply-box"></div><div class="paging-box"></div></div></div><div class="list-item reply-wrap " data-id="4557198192" data-index="0"><div class="user-face"><a href="//space.bilibili.com/8286433" target="_blank" data-usercard-mid="8286433">
    <div class="bili-avatar">
      
<img class="bili-avatar-img bili-avatar-face bili-avatar-img-radius" src="https://i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/035d35ca5036511adfd69906e7b8cb8cfcc10e52.jpg@96w_96h_1c_1s.webp" alt="">

      
      
      <span class="bili-avatar-icon"></span>
    </div>
  </a></div><div class="con "><div class="user"><a data-usercard-mid="8286433" href="//space.bilibili.com/8286433" target="_black" class="name" style="color:">好想吃小笼包啊</a><a class="level-link" href="//www.bilibili.com/blackboard/help.html#%E4%BC%9A%E5%91%98%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3" target="_blank"><i class="level l5"></i></a></div><p class="text">现在互联网舆论事件似乎都陷入了一个怪圈：爆发舆论→群情激愤（or等待吃瓜）→立场不明（or容易煽动）的群体开始带节奏→事件持续升温，各流派之间你来我往→真相披露，某些群体开始退场，被利用的群体离开或反思，高明党换个阵营继续输出，观察派开始出来发表观点。<br>回顾整个事件可以发现，对于舆论推动事件的发展，最大的推力反而是被利用的群体；不可否认他们确实错了，也很容易被煽动，但如果把群情激奋的环节全部换成理性吃瓜，失去了舆论的压力后续事件可能就草草完结了，在一个事件没有得出结论前是无法断定正反的。而这部分群体错了吗，确实错了，一味的被煽动，对环境造成了各种各样的影响。但这样却是常态，如今的社会环境还不足以培养大批的知识理论精英，大部分都还只是为生活柴米油盐操心的普通人罢了，提出劝阻是应该的，但也不必过于苛求。而对于吃瓜和观察的部分来说，他们始终占据着最高的道德之地，毕竟不参与就不会错。但我们如今要思考的真的只是对与错吗，我认为应当开始思考：我们如何去做，才会对这个世界产生更好的影响。<br>在这样的事件中多关注，保持理性，适当发声，参与评论，提出合理质疑，才是优解。<br><br>——————个人拙见，欢迎互相评论交流。</p><div class="info"><span class="time">2021-05-13 11:52</span><span class="like "><i></i><span>2</span></span><span class="hate "><i></i></span><span class="reply btn-hover">回复</span><div class="operation more-operation"><div class="spot"></div><div class="opera-list"><ul><li class="blacklist">加入黑名单</li><li class="report">举报</li></ul></div></div></div><div class="reply-box"></div><div class="paging-box"></div></div></div><div class="list-item reply-wrap " data-id="4557196353" data-index="1"><div class="user-face"><a href="//space.bilibili.com/89328539" target="_blank" data-usercard-mid="89328539">
    <div class="bili-avatar">

      <span class="bili-avatar-icon"></span>
    </div>
  </a></div><div class="con "><div class="user"><a data-usercard-mid="89328539" href="//space.bilibili.com/89328539" target="_black" class="name" style="color:">阿花不口渴</a><a class="level-link" href="//www.bilibili.com/blackboard/help.html#%E4%BC%9A%E5%91%98%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3" target="_blank"><i class="level l5"></i></a><div class="nameplate"><a class="nameplate-icon" href="https://account.bilibili.com/site/nameplate.html" target="_blank"><img src="//i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/9abfa4769357f85937782c2dbc40fafda4f57217.png@40w_40h.webp"></a><div class="nameplate-card"><i class="nameplate-arrow"></i><img class="nameplate-pic" src="//i1.hdslb.com/bfs/face/51ca16136e570938450bca360f28761ceb609f33.png@62w_62h.webp"><div class="nameplate-text"><p class="n-name">饭圈萌新</p><p class="n-title" title="当前持有粉丝勋章最高等级>=5级">当前持有粉丝勋章最高等级&gt;=5级</p><p class="n-type"><span>普通勋章</span><a href="https://account.bilibili.com/site/nameplate.html" target="_blank">查看全部&gt;&gt;</a></p></div></div></div></div><p class="text">QQ群里有人说遗体不给家属看<img src="//i0.hdslb.com/bfs/emote/b4cb77159d58614a9b787b91b1cd22a81f383535.png@100w_100h.webp" class="small" alt="[妙啊]"></p><div class="info"><span class="time">2021-05-13 11:51</span><span class="like "><i></i><span>2</span></span><span class="hate "><i></i></span><span class="reply btn-hover">回复</span><div class="operation more-operation"><div class="spot"></div><div class="opera-list"><ul><li class="blacklist">加入黑名单</li><li class="report">举报</li></ul></div></div></div><div class="reply-box"></div><div class="paging-box"></div></div></div><div class="list-item reply-wrap " data-id="4557195153" data-index="2"><div class="user-face"><a href="//space.bilibili.com/63926264" target="_blank" data-usercard-mid="63926264">
    <div class="bili-avatar">

        </div>
      <span class="bili-avatar-icon"></span>

  </a></div><div class="con "><div class="user"><a data-usercard-mid="310492" href="//space.bilibili.com/310492" target="_black" class="name" style="color:">沐灯</a><a class="level-link" href="//www.bilibili.com/blackboard/help.html#%E4%BC%9A%E5%91%98%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3" target="_blank"><i class="level l6"></i></a></div><p class="text">第一天放监控——你们泄露未成年人隐私！<br>表明是家属同意放出的监控——你们动用职权强迫死者家属签字！<br>死者家属忍着悲痛出来澄清事实——假的！家属肯定是被威胁了/收了钱！<br>——————————<br>你看，实际上根本就是一个死循环，因为人一旦死咬住一个观点，基于主观臆断的理由是很容易找的。而且官方需要讲逻辑拿证据并考虑社会影响，但看客不需要。<br>再加之死者母亲出于某些原因一直在发表着诸多不符合事实的言论。<br>虽然这次地方的官方公馆处理客观上是灾难性的，但实话实说，面对这种潜在的突发情况，没几个人能保证一定可以做得更好。<br>这也从客观反映出目前我国官方媒体的基本功普遍不够扎实。<br>除了新华社没一个能打的。<img src="//i0.hdslb.com/bfs/emote/bf7e00ecab02171f8461ee8cf439c73db9797748.png@100w_100h.webp" class="small" alt="[脱单doge]"></p><div class="info"><span class="time">2021-05-13 11:40</span><span class="like "><i></i><span>2</span></span><span class="hate "><i></i></span><span class="reply btn-hover">回复</span><div class="operation more-operation"><div class="spot"></div><div class="opera-list"><ul><li class="blacklist">加入黑名单</li><li class="report">举报</li></ul></div></div></div><div class="reply-box"></div><div class="paging-box"></div></div></div><div class="list-item reply-wrap " data-id="4557127798" data-index="13"><div class="user-face"><a href="//space.bilibili.com/36422193" target="_blank" data-usercard-mid="36422193">
